channel.title: 13. Describing People and Places – Adjectives in Action! on Italiano con Geoff
channel.description: Recent content in 13. Describing People and Places – Adjectives in Action! on Italiano con Geoff

item.title: Lesson 13.1: Describing People – From Tall to Talkative
item.description: In this lesson, you’ll learn how to describe people in Italian — with real adjectives, real grammar, and some real personality.

item.title: Exercise 13.1: Practice – Describing People with Style
item.description: Put your new adjectives to the test! Fill in the blanks, fix the grammar, and maybe laugh once or twice.
